nodes.text: Virgillia 7 was a planet located within the Virgillia system of the Outer Rim Territories.

It was a tiny colony world that had been a hotbed of Virgillian Free Alignment resistance against the Imperial-aligned Aristocracy since the beginning of the Virgillian Civil War. The resistance forces were led by the parents of Tessa Manchisco, until Imperial forces raided the Manchisco home and summarily executed them, leaving Tessa to flee and hide in the homes of other resistance members.
Early in the Clone Wars, it was the site of a mission.
